runs.comm: Sehwag cops a body blow first up, van der Wath bangs it short and angles that into Segwag's mid-riff
juicy delivery that, full and wide outside off, Sehwag gets on the front foot and slaps it through cover for four, India are on the board
smashed hard to cover where a superb save cuts off the boundary
short and wide, it moved away from Sehwag too, pretty close to being wide but the umpire lets it go, Sehwag resisted the urge to upper-cut that
short of a length outside off stump, Sehwag drives hard but straight to point
fuller in length and Sehwag plays the square drive again to point
drifting down leg side, Tendulkar moves across his stumps and the ball whizzes down leg, called wide
short of a length and on middle stump, Tendulkar moves across again and tucks it off his pads
loud loud shout for lbw, Umpire Jerling said not out, that pitched on off and cut back into Tendulkar who got across his stumps and got hit a touch high on the pad
full outside off, Tendulkar gets half forward and pushes it to cover
what was that? A mis-field from a South African? That's like spotting a Dodo in this age. Tendulkar pushed that to mid-off where Morkel;s fumble allowed the single
beaten by one that pitched outside off and moved away from Tendulkar's fishing blade
Tendulkar plays it to point, Langeveldt overstepped, free hit coming up
Tendulkar tries to slog it out of the ground, gets a thick edge to Boucher who takes the catch but the batsman can't be out off a free hit
beaten outside the off stump
nearly chopped it on! van der Wath brought that back into Sehwag who tried to cut but got a thick bottom edge past the stumps
Was that Superman? de Villiers defies gravity to take that wide ball down leg side, splendid save
short of a length outside off, Sehwag tries to cut but the room isn't there, gets a bottom edge that goes to slip on the bounce
"It's my party and I'll bounce you if I want to", van der Wath sends that over Sehwag's head
banged in short again, it climbs on Sehwag and whizzes past the outside edge
pitches outside off stumpa nd swings away from Sehwag who ... lets it go
sublime shot, full outside off, Tendulkar gets on the front foot and drives that perfectly between cover and mid-off for four
much better length from Langeveldt, Tendulkar goes back and defends to point
Tendulkar's taking Langeveldt on now, that was full and very wide, Tendulkar tries to flay it over extra cover but slices it behind point for four
angling into the pads from over the wicket, defended on the leg side
Langeveldt gets his man, Tendulkar tried to smash one from outside off, he tried to hit it too hard and chopped it on to his stumps, the crowds explode in celebration
pitches on leg and hits Mongia on the pad
you can't bowl on the pads to Sehwag, he easily flicked that behind square for four
excellent length and it jags back into Sehwag from off stump, Sehwag gets hit on the pad and they run a leg bye to point
bizarre shot, absolutely bizzare, that pitched outside off and moved away from Mongia who just stood and drove airly, he was nowhere near that
fuller length and straighter line, Mongia gets an inside edge to deep square leg
a bit too straight from van der Wath, Mongia flicks it off his pads but can't beat midwicket
short of a length on off stump, not much Mongia can do with that except defend back to the bowler
hits the good length straightaway, worked down to third man for one
banged over midwicket for four, Telemachus dropped that far too short, Mongia got into position in a flash and lofted for a one-bounce four
wafts again outside the off stump at one that moves away from him, gets beaten
much closer to the stumps and once again Mongia fends for it outside off and gets beaten
short of a length and on middle and leg, Mongia gets on the back foot and defends on the legside
he doesn't have much of a clue about balls that pitch just outside off nad move away from him, that's the umpteenth time he's been beaten by such a ball
straight line and just short of a length, hits Sehwag on the pad
defended on the leg side

short and wide outside off and it bounces on Sehwag who, predictably, upper cuts it, Roger Telemauchus runs across, the balls movign away from him, he gets two hands to it as he dives towards the fence but the ball bounces into his hands and over the fence
width offered outside off and Sehwag guides that past first slip and down to the third man fence
dropped short of cover on the front foot for a quick single
short of a length, pitches on leg, Mongia moves across and tries to flick but is extremely early on the shot, gets a leading edge towards cover
supreme one-day, oops, Pro20 shot, not that short and not that wide but Sehwag cuts that fine down to the third man fence
width ofered again outside off, Sehwag cuts past point
Telemachus bounces Sehwag who doesn't quite manage to get out of the way, the ball hits the helmet and runs down to fine leg for four leg byes
defended on the leg side, they thought about the single but wisely decided against it
that's terribly wide, poor ball, Sehwag has a go at it but can't reach it, wide called
Telemachus comes back well, angles that into Sehwag's middle stump, tucked to midwicket for a single
angles across the left hander from over teh wciket, defended to point
full on the pads, Sehwag flicks it off his pads and times it well enough to run two
short ball, Sehwag backs away and cuts hard over point, that went like a tracer bullet to the fence
oooh he needs to keep his cool here, he backs away again and tries to heave it over the off side but misses
angling into Sehwag from over the wicket, cramping him for room, defended to point for one
perfect length and line to Mongia, pitching on off and moving away from the left hander, Mongia fended at it from his crease and was beaten
pushed into the covers for  s single to end the over
and Mongia gets beaten again outside the off stump, this is getting very predictable now, he can't touch one in that area
width offered this time outside off, Mongia frees his arms to cut but missed that by a long way

disaster for India! Sehwag is run-out. Mongia drives it to mid-off and sets off for the run, Sehwag takes off from the non-striker's end, Mongia changes his mind and turns back, Sehwag is left stranded more than half-way down, the throw from mid-off is a poor one but Langeveldt collects it and dives full length to break the stumps, memories of Jonty Rhodes from the 1992 World Cup come to mind
full on the pads, Mongia flicks that easily through midwicket for four
width offered from outside off, guided down to third man for one
left alone outside off stump
full on the stumps, Mongia tucks that around the corner and runs hard, he wants two and gets it in the end, well run
lands on a good length on middle and leg, Mongia defends back towards the bowler
one bounce and four! Gives him the charge and slams that cleanly over mid-on with a flow of the arms, welcome boundary for India
full and moving across him, he gets forward and drops the hands on it, calls of 'NO' back to Dhoni as Gibbs swoops in from point

insane! A good, full delivery on off stump, Mongia defends and his bat brakes cleanly in half! I've never seen that happen before! Wasn't even an express delivery, or Brett Lee bowling, but the ball landed smack on the maker's name and spliced it in half! SG sponsors must be hiding their faces...
good length ball on the stumps, he defends...his bats in one piece, all good

Langeveldt! A quick, good length ball outside off stump, Dhoni stands there and tries some sort of late cut/dab and succeeds in chopping onto his off stump...no fireworks from him, South Africa on top!
full ball going down leg, Karthick falls over trying to flick, sets off for the run and runs smack into Langeveldt
quick and again pitched outside leg stump, raps Mongia on the leg, and thats some appeal from the bowler, not out says the umpire
dropped in short on middle and leg, he hops and swivels  that down past square leg, Bosman on the ropes covers good ground, slides, and saves four
lands on off stump and moves it in to Mongia, who stands leaden-footed and almost chops onto his stumps, but the ball sneaks past middle and off...whew!
beauty, sir, beauty! Lands this on a sweet spot outside off stump, and the swing beats a stiff Karthik, who stands and feels for that and is clueless, good over from Langeveldt
fullish on middle and leg, driven loosely to midwicket
lands this outside off stump and shaves it away, and for the zillionth time Mongia just stands and plays away from his body
this one's straighter and now Mongia manages to work it in the gap at mid-wicket for one
full outside off stump, onto the front foot comes Karthik, pushing to point for one
a good length outside off stump, Mongia backs away and drives to cover, who fields and saves runs
oh, a four! Fullish on off stump, Mongia charges down the track and swings that across the line, manages to find the gap between mid-on and mid-wicket and the ball trickles over the ropes
full outside off stump, he drives and gets an inside edge
full outside off stump, driven well but straight to Kemp at cover, Mongia cant beat the gap
full again, and he drives that to Gibbs at point, pressure, pressure...
Mongia awakens! Full outside off stump, Mongia has a step back and just smokes that handsomely over extra cover for a huge six, massive!
middle and leg line, worked into the gap at mid-wicket
fullish outside off stump, little movement, and whats this? Karthik shoulders arms! Hasnt he got the memo? The Tests dont start till a little later this month
a good length outside off stump, steered in the gap at gully down to third man for one
full outside off stump, Karthik comes forward and pushes that to backward point, a dot ball again
quicker on a good length outside off stump, that ball jags in and catches Karthik going nowhere, an inside edge but that speedy de Villiers pulls off a fine diving stop
full on middle and off, and Karthik slams that over mid-on with a shimmy of the feet, times it well and gets four
fullish outside off stump, pushed to Gibbs at backward point
full outside off stump, pitches and swings the other way, and Karthik, swinging wildly, gets beaten all ends up
short and wide, chopped weakly down to third man for one

strives for the yorker, too full and Karthik drives, gets the toe edge of the bat, ball pops down onto the ground and then bobs up to Kemp at slip, who claims the catch as he thought it was off the boot, but after going upstairs its ruled not-out, it was a bump-ball
full outside off stump and moving away, and again Karthik shoulders arms...umm, run rate....??
short and moving into him from outside off stump, and he runs that down to third man for one
short outside off stump, Mongia backs away and frees the arms, doesnt time it well but gets one in the gap at cover
full on middle and off, driven to mid-on who fumbles and allows the run
lands outside off stump, Karthik moves across and cheekily chips that over short fine leg, effective shot
full in the blockhole, Karthik digs that out to cover and calls for the run, good throw from Peterson but he's safe
lands outside off stump and moves in, Mongia picks that from middle stump and chops it down to third man
short and wide, runs it down to third man for one more
full on off stump, pushed into the covers for a quick run
full outside off stump, Karthik slashes that past Gibbs at backward point, who manages to get a hand to it and slow the pace, and the sweeper saves it on the ropes

tossed up, spinning away from him on off stump, Mongia sweeps across the line but misses, and de Villiers whips off the bails in a flash, Mongia's backfoot is on the line, but after what seemed like ages the third umpire rules it not out! He's mad! Mongia was out! Whoah!
tossed up outside off stump, Mongia reverse sweeps but misses, de Villiers takes it

now he's gone! Tossed up on middle and off, Mongia steps out and tries to clear the infield but mistimes the lofted chip and Langeveldt, covering good ground at mid-on, tumbles and holds a great catch
tossed up on the stumps, swept out to deep backward square leg
flat and quick outside off stump, driven to mid-on
quicker and shorter, Karthik advances and tries to work that through mid-wicket, the balls too quick and hurries onto him, he misses the swipe and picks up a leg bye to point
short and wide, Karthik stands and dabs that cheekily past a diving de Villiers and even Henderson diving on the ropes cant prevent the four
full outside off stump, Karthik backs away and chops that to point for one, he exposed all the stumps there
short and wide, Raina hops in the crease, opens the face of the bat and picks up a single down to third man
a bouncer, tremendous ball! Quick and rising outside off stump, moves into him, and a comfortable sway back from Karthik, all well to look at but its a dot ball!
quick and short, moving into him, he works that off the hips past square leg and settles for one
good, quick delivery outside off stump, Raina has a mighty swing across the line but misses, a dot ball, well done van der Wath....or Raina...depends on how you see it!
MAXIMUM! Tossed up on middle and off, down onto one knee goes Karthik and slogsweeps that over deep midwicket for six, awesome, simply awesome!
flatter outside off stump, he tries to sweep but misses...dot ball...
flat and quick on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket...just the single...
flat on middle and off, Raina sweeps past square leg for one, and the match it tied!
full and flat outside off stump, Karthik chops that past backward point to win the match! India have won their first match on tour in tense style, well played!
